Package scraper.templatescraper.templates

Class SnlArticleTemplate

java.lang.Object
scraper.templatescraper.TemplateScraper
scraper.templatescraper.ArticleTemplate
scraper.templatescraper.templates.SnlArticleTemplate
public class SnlArticleTemplate
extends ArticleTemplate
An implementation of an ArticleTemplate made to serve as an example of how a template could be implemented. The template is made to scrape articles from the website snl.no.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Vetle Jahr
See Also:
ArticleTemplate

  • Constructor Details

    • SnlArticleTemplate

      public SnlArticleTemplate​(java.lang.String url)
      Sets the source for the templateScrper as a URL. SnlArticleTemplate only supports URL as a source as it is made to scrape articles from snl.no.
      Parameters:
      url - URL for the source of the templateScraper

  • Method Details

      public java.lang.String getIntroduction()
      Gets the introduction of the article. The introduction is the first paragraph of the article.

    • getDatePublished

      public java.time.LocalDate getDatePublished()
      Gets the date the article was published. Snl articles only display the date of when the article was last updated, and not when the article was originally published, and therefore this method will return the date of the last update. This method return the same as getDateLastUpdated() and the Date of getDateTimePublished and getDateTimeLastUpdated.
      Specified by:
      getDatePublished in class ArticleTemplate
      Returns:
      date the article was published

    • getDateTimePublished

      public java.time.LocalDateTime getDateTimePublished()
      Gets the date and time the article was published. Snl articles only display the date of when the article was last updated, and not when the article was originally published, and therefore this method will return the date of the last update. This method return the same as getDateTimeLastUpdated(). If only the date is needed, getDatePublished() should be used instead.
      Specified by:
      getDateTimePublished in class ArticleTemplate
      Returns:
      date the article was published

    • getDateLastUpdated

      public java.time.LocalDate getDateLastUpdated()
      Gets the date the article was last updated. Snl articles only display the date of when the article was last updated, and not when the article was originally published. Therefore, this method will return the same as getDatePublished().
      Specified by:
      getDateLastUpdated in class ArticleTemplate
      Returns:
      date the article was last updated

    • getDateTimeLastUpdated

      public java.time.LocalDateTime getDateTimeLastUpdated()
      Gets the date and time the article was last updated. Snl articles only display the date of when the article was last updated, and not when the article was originally published. Therefore, this method will return the same as getDateTimePublished().
      Specified by:
      getDateTimeLastUpdated in class ArticleTemplate
      Returns:
      date and time the article was last updated
